pr_title: CMTS-91: Improve ValueProvider caching with providerId information

timeline.bodyText: We should test that 2 different operations with the same value providerId and same values, return the same hash
timeline.author: lucianoRM

replies.bodyText: But that is the same operation. I just want to make sure that there is nothing related to the operation itself used for the hashing. If we are using the operation name for example (which we shouldn't) this test will pass but the one I am asking to add should fail.
replies.author: lucianoRM

replies.bodyText: Ok, I will add another test with this scenario.
replies.author: gsfernandes

timeline.message: CMTS-91: Improve ValueProvider caching with providerId information
PR feedback, adding namespace as part of keyId
PR feedback, adding namespace as part of keyId

timeline.bodyText: only the namespace and if not present the id? You are assuming that if the namespace is not present, then the id should be the identifier right?
timeline.author: lucianoRM

replies.bodyText: Yes, there is no other way to associate it to an extension.
replies.author: gsfernandes
